definition: medicine/drug/substance used for a specific purpose (e.g. poisoning, explosion, fermenting)/CL:種|种[zhong3],服[fu4],味[wei4]/to poison
to check/to examine/to inspect/to exercise restraint

sentences.english: And earlier this month, the government executed its top food-and-drug regulator after convicting him on bribery charges.
sentences.chinese: 本月初，政府因受賄罪處決了原國家藥檢局的局長。

sentences.english: Missing three tests results in an automatic two-year ban.
sentences.chinese: 缺席三次藥檢的結果是自動禁賽兩年。

sentences.english: In the past, Drug testing and ego issues have gotten in the way of making the fight.
sentences.chinese: 過去，藥檢和尊嚴的爭論阻礙了拳賽的進行。

sentences.english: Athletes face suspension only if they test positive for it at a competition.
sentences.chinese: 運動員僅會在比賽中因大麻藥檢陽性而遭遇禁賽。

sentences.english: All five have tested positive after out-of-competition tests.
sentences.chinese: 她們都是在賽後的藥檢中被檢查出陽性的。

sentences.english: You can breathe a sigh of relief.Your drug test came back negative.
sentences.chinese: 鬆口氣吧，你的藥檢呈陰性。

sentences.english: The pre-race inquiries have become as routine as the postrace drug screens.
sentences.chinese: 賽前質詢已經像賽後藥檢一樣是家常便飯了。

sentences.english: In this article, the idea for designing a city level institute of drug inspection was briefly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 就新建市級藥檢所的設計思路做一簡單介紹。

sentences.english: Phelps has never tested positive for a banned substance.
sentences.chinese: 菲爾普斯從未在藥檢中檢出陽性。

sentences.english: In order to track record in the file, Fleury asked to take the initiative to test the door.
sentences.chinese: 爲使成績記錄在檔，弗勒門主動要求接受藥檢。

definition: to ride to take up an official appointment (idiom); to take on a job with alacrity/to undertake a task
Jean-Paul Sartre (1905-1980), French existential philosopher and novelist
lit. to fix the tone with a single hammer blow/fig. to make the final decision
Saudi Arabia (Tw), abbr. for 沙烏地阿拉伯王國|沙乌地阿拉伯王国
environmental impact assessment EIA/abbr. to 環評|环评
pinyin: huan2 jing4 ying3 xiang3 ping2 gu1

definition: to shut down (a factory)/to close a facility/a lockout
